basic.blooming: Foliage plants, viewing period year around, flowering period in winter and spring
basic.color: Leaf color dark green, flower color white, pink

maintenance.soil: Alkaline soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
